translations: 犹太初等学校；犹太高等学校

sentences.sentence: It is part of Yeshiva University.
sentences.translation: 这是犹太大学的一部分。

sentences.sentence: What choice?... the last thing I took away from the yeshiva is this... we can't run from who we are. Our destiny chooses us.
sentences.translation: 什么选择？…我从犹太学校学来的最重要的就是…我们不能逃避自己。我们的命运决定了我们。

sentences.sentence: Researchers at the Albert Einstein College of Medicine of Yeshiva University in New York recently reported the latest findings.
sentences.translation: 纽约爱因斯坦犹太医学院的研究者们最近报告了他们的最新研究成果。
